item.description:
@t0xicn3ss wrote:

could someone tell me the format or whatever for like if your making something like a cave require 90 combat sorta like strength like if playerlevel[0] == 90 } or whatever would it be like

case NUMBER: if(playerLevel >= #) { teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; sendMessage("You cut your arms..."); } break;

what would i do for a required combat?

-toxic
